name: The Rebellion of Epil and Shion

metadata.name: Shion The Beater
metadata.description:
Hi! My name is Shion! I’m kinda cute but don’t mess with me or I beat your f**kn a**!!

Bzzzz!! I’ve got a message from Epil, gotta go now!! Let’s destroy the empire!!

Character : Shion
